items.title: Train stabbing suspect charged with further offences including attempted murder
items.description: Anthony Williams is charged with two counts of attempted murder along with other alleged offences.

items.title: Nicki Minaj supports contested Trump claim Christians being persecuted in Nigeria
items.description: The US-based Trinidadian rapper addressed the UN in New York alongside Trump administration officials, making claims that lack evidence.

items.title: Russian spy ship on edge of UK waters, defence secretary says
items.description: John Healey says the Russian ship is in waters north of Scotland and is being monitored by UK forces.

items.title: Epstein files bill to be sent to Trump after approval from Congress
items.description: Once the US president signs the measure, the justice department will have 30 days to release the materials.

items.title: Heating tips to keep your home warm when budgets are squeezed
items.description: As temperatures fall across much of the UK, how should you heat your home and keep yourself safe?
